thread.title: Cristiano Ronaldo nutmegged in training, Real Madrid team mates celebrate (video)
thread.title_full: Cristiano Ronaldo nutmegged in training, Real Madrid team mates celebrate (video)

author: Ben Green
title: Cristiano Ronaldo nutmegged in training, Real Madrid team mates celebrate (video)
text:
Cristiano Ronaldo nutmegged in training, Real Madrid team mates celebrate (video) By Ben Green   Cristiano Ronaldo nutmegged 
Video has emerged from Real Madrid training on Tuesday. 
Los Blancos have the week off, having beaten Espanyol 2-0 on Saturday. Their next game is on Wednesday evening when they play Valencia away. 
That game is an opportunity for Real Madrid to go four points clear in La Liga, with a game in hand. Marcelo loves it 
As you would expect, those players training at Real Madrid today looked in good spirits. 
And, we join them in a Rondo exercise, on the video below. 
Brazilian Casemiro, who is in the midst of an outstanding season, plays the ball through Cristiano Ronaldo’s legs. 
Cue much delight from Marcelo, who is standing next to his fellow Brazilian. So excited is Marcelo that he runs and dances around Casemiro! 
Proof, if it were still needed, that Cristiano Ronaldo is still human, his latest picture on Instagram suggests he is enjoying life right now though. Nutmegs and all! Casemiro nutmegs Cristiano Ronaldo – video A post shared by Esporte Interativo (@esporteinterativo) on Feb 21, 2017 at 11:19am PST Cristiano Ronaldo on Instagram A post shared by Cristiano Ronaldo (@cristiano) on Feb 21, 2017 at 4:48am PST
